item.description:
Hey Folks,

Remember the band Morphine? Well they're back! At least two thirds of the way back...

You may recall that Morphine's frontman, Mark Sandman, died of a heart attack on stage in July 1999. Since then, the other original band members have worked on various projects.

These days, they have joined forces with slide guitarist/vocalist Jeremy Lyons to form a new band called "The Elastic Waste Band". Jeremy plays an array of one-of-a-kind electric guitars and even a version of Sandman's distinctive 2-string slide bass.

In addition to a slew of cool new material, the band plays a number of Morphine's best tunes - and they really kick 'em too!

If you were a fan of Morphine, this is a trip back in time to one of the great bands of the Boston music scene. If you've never heard of Morphine, you're in for a sonic treat!

Hope to see you there. This is a joint meetup with Boston Live Music and Social Fun, so we should get a good crowd!
item.how_to_find_us: Patrick and Paul each bear a striking resemblance to their respective photos!
item.name: Members of Morphine @ Atwoods Tavern
